user.title: Set up TvOverlay UI
user.description: Enter the connection details for your TvOverlay device.

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of the TvOverlay device
data_description.name: Friendly name for this device

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to TvOverlay device. Please check the host and port.

init.title: TvOverlay UI Options
init.description: Update the connection settings for your TvOverlay device.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to TvOverlay device. Please check the host and port.

notify.name: Send Notification
notify.description: Send a notification to a TvOverlay device.

host.name: Host
host.description: Manual host:port (e.g., 192.168.1.100:5001). Use if device is not configured.

smallIcon.name: Small Icon
smallIcon.description: MDI icon or image URL. Local paths not supported - must be full URL. Examples: mdi:bell, http://192.168.1.100:8123/local/icon.png

smallIconColor.name: Small Icon Color
smallIconColor.description: Color for the small icon. Use hex (#FF5500) or color name (red, blue, green, etc.).

largeIcon.name: Large Icon
largeIcon.description: MDI icon or image URL. Local paths not supported - must be full URL. Examples: mdi:account, http://192.168.1.100:8123/local/icon.png

mediaUrl.name: Media URL
mediaUrl.description: Local paths not supported - must be full URL. Image: http://192.168.1.100:8123/local/image.jpg. Video: rtsp://IP/stream or .m3u8/.mpd URL.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: How long to show the notification (in seconds).

notify_fixed.name: Send Fixed Notification
notify_fixed.description: Send a persistent fixed notification to a TvOverlay device.

host.name: Host
host.description: Manual host:port (e.g., 192.168.1.100:5001). Use if device is not configured.

id.name: Notification ID
id.description: Unique ID for this notification (for updates/clearing).

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: MDI icon or image URL. Local paths not supported - must be full URL. Examples: mdi:weather-sunny, http://192.168.1.100:8123/local/icon.png

messageColor.name: Message Color
messageColor.description: Color for the message text. Use hex (#FFFFFF) or color name (white, red, etc.).

iconColor.name: Icon Color
iconColor.description: Color for the icon. Use hex (#FFFFFF) or color name (white, red, etc.).

borderColor.name: Border Color
borderColor.description: Color for the border. Use hex (#FFFFFF) or color name (white, red, etc.).

backgroundColor.name: Background Color
backgroundColor.description: Color for the background. Use hex (#000000) or color name (black, gray, etc.).

shape.name: Shape
shape.description: Notification shape: circle, rounded, or rectangular.

clear_fixed.name: Clear Fixed Notification
clear_fixed.description: Clear a fixed notification by setting it invisible.

host.name: Host
host.description: Manual host:port (e.g., 192.168.1.100:5001). Use if device is not configured.

id.name: Notification ID
id.description: The ID of the fixed notification to clear.

id_required.message: Notification ID is required. Please provide a unique ID to identify this notification.

device_not_found.message: Device not found. Please select a configured device or provide a valid host.

notification_failed.message: Failed to send notification to the device.
